"Cristobal": "Well done. You have my utmost thanks."
"We owe so much to you. I'd like to thank you again for all the help you've given up until now."
"We still don't have much to offer, but you're free to continue using our camp however you please."
"Our mission requires us to remain in Kvaris for the time being."
"Stop by anytime you're in the area. You'll always be welcome here."
"I hope you'll continue to aid us."
"You represent the ideal ARKS."
"You're free to make use of this camp however you may. Rely on us, as we rely on you."
"You're a brave and honorable ARKS."
"Hey, I heard you were able to find Ilma safe and sound."
"The information Ilma brought with him has also reached out ears."
"It seems we're going to have to make various preparations of our own."
"At any rate, we'll have to first focus on amassing the necessary funds."
"Therefore! We've implemented a voluntary training program within the Independent Corps."
"It's far tougher than usual missions and includes higher difficulty objectives."
"What do you think, would you be interested? Personally, I think it'd be be an invaluable experience for you."
"Hey, I heard you were able to find Ilma safe and sound."
"The information Ilma brought with him has also reached our ears."
"It seems we're going to have to make various preparations of our own."
"At any rate, we'll have to first focus on amassing the necessary funds."
"Therefore! We've implemented a voluntary training program within the Independent Corps."
"It's far tougher than usual missions and includes higher difficulty objectives."
"What do you think, would you be interested? Personally, I think it'd be be an invaluable experience for you."
"It will no doubt be a grueling battle, but I'm confident that you have what it takes."
"I await a good report."
"Ah, that's unfortunate."
"Good work. How does it feel to take out a truly strong enemy?"
"Ah, nevermind. It's you we're talking about here. You've probably already taken out something even stronger than one of those."
"At any rate, these are just the good results I was expecting."
"At this rate, it won't be long before you've completed this training regimen entirely."
"Hm? What's wrong? Did you think I would be finished with you after just that?"
"Sorry, but you've just gotten started. Our training regimen isn't something that can be completed by folks with a half-assed resolve."
"Indeed, out of every one of these troops here, not one of them have completed the full course."
"I'll be watching you to see how far you'll make it before you tap out."
"You'll be tackling the next thing on the menu when you're ready."
"Oh, are you ready?"
"This is where the Kvaris Vanguard's real training regimen starts."
"I wonder how far you'll make it. I trust your last victory wasn't just a fluke."
"There's no rush. Take all the time you need."
"Good work out there."
"I bet multiple Dread Enemies must've been pretty rough even for you."
"However, your opponents here onward will be stronger yet still."
"We cannot have another tragedy like Aelio Town happen again. That is why we must train as hard as we do."
"...But that's not the only reason."
"I want to dispel the regrets of those who fought at Aelio Town."
"Hm? Why am I so concerned with Aelio Town?"
"There was a time I was stationed in Aelio Town. Back when I was still an ARKS rookie."
"That village grew on me, and I got to know its people well. Much of who I am today is thanks to Garoa."
"We will win this fight against the DOLLS, on behalf of Garoa and his men. I'm sure you feel the same."
"If you do, see this training to the end. You have more room to improve."
"Done with your break? Let's recommence your training."
"If you feel like giving up here, you couldn't possibly hold a candle to Garoa's strength."
"Use him as your motivation. Aim to be on his level one day."
"Acknowledge your limits and try to overcome them, but not so much that you injure yourself."
"You did good. Take a breather for now."
"There are brief moments when you fight where you resemble Garoa's former self."
"That man was strong, but that wasn't all he was."
"Garoa's very reason for becoming stronger was likely part of what made him as strong as he was."
"He fought as the leader of Aelio Town, carrying the hope of the entire village on his back."
"Only after I had received reports of his death did I realize how far he was willing to go. Sad, isn't it?"
"Listen. Don't ever lose sight of your own convictions. They will surely be a source of great strength for you."
"Take that as advice from an ARKS who wishes he realized that sooner."
"With that, we've reached the final part of your training. Take a break and let me know when you're ready to resume."
"Alright. This is your last challenge from me."
"You've made it this far, so now it's just a battle of wills. See this through to the end."
"You've made it this far, so now it's just a battle of wills."
"I believe you've definitely got what it takes. Show me your conviction."
"It seems you're still fatigued. Take a deep breath, relax, and then we'll continue."
"Great work. This is something you can truly call a grand achievement."
"Garoa's death is without a doubt a great loss for ARKS as a whole."
"However, it's possible that Garoa managed to leave behind a new hope. Perhaps you are that hope."
"I'm proud to have been able to meet you like this."
"With this, you have completed the training regimen, but you'd do well to continue to challenging strong enemies."
"There are likely enemies that we don't yet know about here in Kvaris."
"If you encounter them, I'd like you to challenge those enemies in much the same way."
"I'll be looking forward to seeing you progress over time."
"Let's continue striving to improve each other as fellow ARKS."
"Let's continue striving to improve each other as fellow ARKS."
"One day, I believe you'll surpass even the likes of Garoa."
